"Attribute Enhancement":
"This explains the process for enhancing an old-type weapon's Attribute.

You can strengthen weapons' Attributes at the Item Lab."

"The following three things are needed for Attribute enhancement:
・Synthesizers
・Material weapons
・Meseta

If your material weapons have the same Attribute (Fire, Ice, etc) as the weapon whose Attribute you are enhancing, the resulting enhancement will be higher."
